branchCategory.name: 90-ITV2000, Electro-Pneumatic Regulator
branchCategory.description: <p>Electro-pneumatic regulator and electronic vacuum regulator series 90-ITV control air/vacuum pressure steplessly in proportion to an electric signal.  They are light weight in design with a bright and easy to read LED display. 90-ITV is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>
